response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and significance, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $7,500. This is a special opportunity tailored specifically for you, considering the high worth of the product to both of us. I look forward to your positive response and the chance to facilitate this valuable transaction. Should you have any questions or need further information, please do not hesitate to reach out.", "product_price": 7500}
